name: logmagic
description: Easily print variables and parameters with keyboard shortcuts for quick debugging.

commands.title: LogMagic: Remove All Log Statements From Current File

logMagic.defaultLanguage.description: The default language to use when the active language is not directly supported by LogMagic.

logMagic.logFormats.description:
Configure one or more log statements to generate & rotate between.
 Can be configured on any setting level, including folders.
 Each statement specification is an object like
{
"logPrefix": "A log-function call including the opening parenthesesis print(",
	"parameterSeparator": "A parameter separator, like a comma",
	"identifierPrefix": "Anything to prefix identifiers with",
	"identifierSuffix": "Anything to suffix identifiers with, like .toString()",
	"logSuffix": "An ending suffix to complete the log statement, like );",
	"quoteCharacter": "The quote character to use when logging strings"
}

scripts.pretest: yarn run test-compile && yarn run lint
